title: Business Analyst Interview Guide
description: Demonstrate analytical skills and business acumen.

content.text: Business Analyst interviews assess your ability to translate business needs into actionable requirements, analyze data for insights, and communicate effectively across stakeholders.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Requirements gathering and documentation
- Data analysis and SQL skills
- Problem-solving and critical thinking
- Stakeholder communication
- Process improvement abilities

**Typical BA interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Hiring manager screen** (60 min)
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (3-4 hours):
   - Case study/analytical exercise
   - SQL or data analysis round
   - Stakeholder scenario round
   - Behavioral round
